title.narrative: Agricultural Development: Sustainable Natural Resource Management and Productivity Enhancement Project

description.narrative: The key project objectives are: (i) more efficient and sustainable natural resourcemanagement; and (ii) improved sector productivity.The expected policy and institutional objectives are enhanced institutional capacity at the provincial and national levels to manage natural resource-based developmentand promote agricultural productivity.

name.narrative: Agricultural Development: Sustainable Natural Resource Management and Productivity Enhancement Project

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.

title.narrative: IATI documentation on IFAD corporate website

description.narrative: More information on how IFAD publish IATI data to ensure the effectiveness of development.

title.narrative: Project page on IFAD corporate website

description.narrative: The IFAD website includes a specific page for this project. More information can be found here.
